summary: CONSUMER STATES  WHILE THE CAR WAS RUNNING A FIRE STARTED UNDER THE HOOD.  TS  PRIOR TO FIRE VEHICLE LOST ELECTRIC POWER AND WARNING LIGHTS ON DASH FLASHED ON.  AIR TEMP SENSOR, AIR INTAKE DUCT, INNER AND OUTER AIR CLEANER ASSEMBLY REPLACED.   WASHER RESERVOIR REPLACED.  PCM REPGORAMMED.  *TT
